data: Check your understanding of how to express your opinion in a group discussion!

first_message: Hey there! Now I will give you 10 sentences to translate into English.This activity is just for my understanding on how well you know this concept so don't worry about making any mistakes. Can we start?
below are array of question objects to be put inside key staged_questions.default.questions

prompt_id: 7deb4075-c026-43fe-906c-5439d404bd9c
question: I think online shopping is easy because you get home delivery.

grammar_concept: Group Discussion - Expressing Opinion
